thread.title: MooVmoo.com Launches the First Human Video Editing Platform Online
thread.title_full: MooVmoo.com Launches the First Human Video Editing Platform Online - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: MooVmoo.com Launches the First Human Video Editing Platform Online
text:
"In a world where people think that technology can do everything, it’s nice to know there are still a few things that humans are better at."
London, England (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
Perfect for GoPro enthusiasts, family video clips, and everything in between, a new online platform was launched in the United States this week for millions of consumers and is the Internet’s first video editing service powered by real human video editors.
“We have built up a worldwide network of video editors that are available to edit all those videos that we shoot and never get round to dealing with", said co-founder DP Fitzgerald. "We've created a superb user-friendly website that saves you time and completely removes the complexity of the video editing process.”
Unlike automated and algorithm-driven smartphone apps, mooVmoo delivers beautiful short 1, 3 or 5 minute "mooVies" to high cinematic standards. Users login to mooVmoo.com to create a title for their mooVie, include brief instructions for the video editor, choose a suitable song for the soundtrack, and then simply upload all their video clips in one seamless go.
"If you’re heavy on video clips, low on time, and tired of auto-editing apps, then mooVmoo really is home movies made easy", concluded co-founder Luis Ureña, "and all for less than $5 dollars for every minute of raw video footage uploaded."
you shoot it - we edit
at mooVmoo.com
-ends-
About mooVmoo
A short introduction is available on the homepage: https://www.moovmoo.com
A more detailed explanation is located at: https://www.moovmoo.com/pages/about-us
Some tips on how to shoot your movies are at: https://www.moovmoo.com/pages/filming-tips-tutorials
The media pack is available at: https://www.moovmoo.com/pages/media-pack
For additional press information, please contact info(at)mooVmoo(dot)com
